step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Nice circular motion. Try to squeeze your shoulder blades together as you roll them back and down.
Great job completing the first set! Remember to breathe deeply when pulling your shoulders back.
Second set starting well. Focus on smooth, controlled movements.
Good control in the circular motion. Ensure both shoulders move together.
Excellent finish to the second set! You're doing great with shoulder mobility.

exercise_summary: You've completed the shoulder rolls exercise well! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Remember to inhale deeply as you pull back to maximize the benefit for lymphatic flow and breathing.
